text: Sun is required to make plants in the botany box.
$(br2)Sun producing is not as simple as planting a bunch of sunflowers in the safety of your basement and letting it make Sun forever.
$(br2)Sun producers won't produce sun or not as effectively if certain conditions are not met.
$(br2)Sun producer plants have a universal condition. They will not make sun if a sun producer of the same kind of plant
is within a 4 block radius of them. 5 or more and its business as usual. However the same is not the case if they are different plants.
$(br)Two Sunflowers won't make sun if they are right next to each other. But a Sunflower and Sunflower Seed? They'll produce sun just fine.
$(br2)Certain sun producers also have unique conditions as well for sun production.
$(br)Sunflower Seeds won't produce any sun without access to sunlight.
$(br)Sunflowers and Twin Sunflowers produce small sun instead of regular sun without access to sunlight.
$(br)Sun-Shrooms are nocturnal, not producing sun at all during the day without the intervention of a coffee bean.
